title: Sustainable interface regulation enabled by a bismuth solid-state surfactant effect for Zn-free anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01644K, Paper
Chen Wang, Bo Chen, Tan Wang, Gabriel Vinicius De Oliveira Silva, Zhi Xu, Guo-Xing Miao, Yunhui Huang, Jing Fu
This study introduces a novel application of Bi as a solid-state surfactant in Zn electrodes, where the arriving Zn adatoms tend to migrate below Bi and nucleate locally instead of diffusing laterally and forming protruding structures.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
